column2: Your invasion plans against [From.GetTitledName] are no longer possible. The invasion has failed before it even started...
You have waited too long to launch your invasion against [From.GetTitledName]! Disgruntled, the hopeful warriors who had flocked to your banner wander off looking for better opportunities.
Large numbers of adventurous carls have arrived from all corners of Scandinavia, hoping to join your great expedition against [From.GetTitledName]!
Large numbers of adventurous warriors have arrived from all corners of your realm, hoping to join your great expedition against [From.GetTitledName]!
A renowned hero has arrived at your court with his housecarls and followers, hoping to partake in your glorious invasion of [From.GetTitledName]!
A renowned hero has arrived at your court with his warriors and followers, hoping to partake in your glorious invasion of [From.GetTitledName]!

[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] forgive me, I have decided to find salvation in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith! I hope we can put this unpleasantness behind us forthwith.\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

There are great opportunities for plunder and glory in England, with the sons of Lodbrok exacting their vengeance on the Saxon kings. My Carls are growing restless, anxious to join the great adventure...
In the name of the Allfather, the Hanged One, the Flaming Eye, I declare my intention to invade your lands and subjugate your people. Richly shall the ravens feast!\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

The Magyar tribes have travelled far and fought viciously against nomads, farmers and city dwellers alike. The fertile plains of the Carpathian basin may offer us peace and succor - a new homeland at last!
The King of the Magyars, [From.GetFirstName], has decided to settle down in the Carpathian basin, making it the new homeland of the Magyar tribes.
The Kingdoms of León and Asturias are to stay united forever, so there will be only one crown and one king ruling them forever.
[From.GetDynName] has decided to found the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] of León. The ancient [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] of Asturias is no more!
After centuries of subjugation, Castille has grown in power and autonomy. The time has come to be recognized as an equal by the other rulers in our region!
[From.GetDynName] has founded a new [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] in Spain, and now rules supreme over [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
After centuries of subjugation, Portugal has grown in power and autonomy. The time has come to be recognized as an equal by the other rulers in our region!
[From.GetDynName] has founded a new [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] in Spain, and now rules supreme over [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

The little County of Aragon, created by the Franks long ago, has become such a prestigious title that many almost considered it to have the prestige of a [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]. Now let it be so!
[From.GetDynName] has founded a new [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] in Spain, and now rules supreme over [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
With the end of Carolingian domination of West Francia, the realm is now more commonly referred to as the Kingdom of France.
With the end of Carolingian domination of East Francia, the realm is now more commonly referred to as the Kingdom of Germany.
With the end of Carolingian domination of Middle Francia, the realm is once again more commonly referred to its older name of Austrasia.

The cowardly king Ælla is kneeling before me in the mud, refusing to meet my eyes. The men call out for various punishments - some more creative than others. I call for silence and a hush descends as the raven banner flutters eagerly above the doomed man. It is time to exact revenge for my dead father, Ragnarr...
The last thing I saw before the heathen savages carved out my eyes was the horrible grin on [From.GetFirstName]'s face. I tried to curl up as they prepared to unman me...
Make room at the high table!
The Raven will Fly over Mercia!
§RAll counties east of the Carpathians are lost.§!\nAll counties within de jure Hungary change culture to Hungarian.\n
Let this be the dawn of a new era!
Asturias or León... what's the difference?
The Raven will Fly over Wessex!
The Raven will Fly over Scotland!
I have other plans for Ælla...
I am crowned King of Hungary
León and Asturias are now one kingdom
